Name: Hypnosis
Description: May put the foe to sleep. Puts the target to sleep.

Name: Meditate
Description: May put the foe to sleep. Puts the target to sleep. Raises the user's ATTACK. Raises the user's Attack by one stage.

Name: Agility
Description: May put the foe to sleep. Puts the target to sleep. Raises the user's ATTACK. Raises the user's Attack by one stage. Sharply increases the user's SPEED. Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

Name: Quick Attack
Description: May put the foe to sleep. Puts the target to sleep. Raises the user's ATTACK. Raises the user's Attack by one stage. Sharply increases the user's SPEED. Raises the user's Speed by two stages. Lets the user get in the first hit. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

Name: Rage
Description: May put the foe to sleep. Puts the target to sleep. Raises the user's ATTACK. Raises the user's Attack by one stage. Sharply increases the user's SPEED. Raises the user's Speed by two stages. Lets the user get in the first hit. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. Raises ATTACK if the user is hit. If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

Name: Teleport
Description: May put the foe to sleep. Puts the target to sleep. Raises the user's ATTACK. Raises the user's Attack by one stage. Sharply increases the user's SPEED. Raises the user's Speed by two stages. Lets the user get in the first hit. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. Raises ATTACK if the user is hit. If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage. A move for fleeing from battle. Immediately ends wild battles.  No effect otherwise.

Name: Struggle
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.

Name: Sketch
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil. Copies the foe's move permanently. Permanently becomes the target's last used move.

Name: Triple Kick
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil. Copies the foe's move permanently. Permanently becomes the target's last used move. Hits three times with rising power. Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

Name: Thief
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil. Copies the foe's move permanently. Permanently becomes the target's last used move. Hits three times with rising power. Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit. An attack that may steal a held item. Takes the target's item.

Name: Spider Web
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil. Copies the foe's move permanently. Permanently becomes the target's last used move. Hits three times with rising power. Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit. An attack that may steal a held item. Takes the target's item. Prevents fleeing or switching. Prevents the target from leaving battle.

Name: Mind Reader
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil. Copies the foe's move permanently. Permanently becomes the target's last used move. Hits three times with rising power. Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit. An attack that may steal a held item. Takes the target's item. Prevents fleeing or switching. Prevents the target from leaving battle. Ensures the next attack will hit. Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target.

Name: Nightmare
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil. Copies the foe's move permanently. Permanently becomes the target's last used move. Hits three times with rising power. Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit. An attack that may steal a held item. Takes the target's item. Prevents fleeing or switching. Prevents the target from leaving battle. Ensures the next attack will hit. Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target. A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn. Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it's asleep.

Name: Flame Wheel
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil. Copies the foe's move permanently. Permanently becomes the target's last used move. Hits three times with rising power. Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit. An attack that may steal a held item. Takes the target's item. Prevents fleeing or switching. Prevents the target from leaving battle. Ensures the next attack will hit. Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target. A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn. Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it's asleep. An attack that may cause a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

Name: Snore
Description: Used only if all PP are exhausted. User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil. Copies the foe's move permanently. Permanently becomes the target's last used move. Hits three times with rising power. Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit. An attack that may steal a held item. Takes the target's item. Prevents fleeing or switching. Prevents the target from leaving battle. Ensures the next attack will hit. Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target. A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn. Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it's asleep. An attack that may cause a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves. A loud attack that can be used only while asleep. Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

Prevents the target from leaving battle. Ensures the next attack will hit. Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target. A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn. Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it's asleep. An attack that may cause a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves. A loud attack that can be used only while asleep. Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping. Works differently for ghost-types. Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.

Name: Sleep Talk
Description: Successive hits raise power. Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns. Stiff wings strike the foe. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage. Prevents fleeing or switching. Prevents the target from leaving battle. Makes the opposite gender infatuated. Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user. Randomly attacks while asleep. Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

Name: Heal Bell
Description: Successive hits raise power. Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns. Stiff wings strike the foe. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage. Prevents fleeing or switching. Prevents the target from leaving battle. Makes the opposite gender infatuated. Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user. Randomly attacks while asleep. Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping. Eliminates all status problems. Cures the entire party of major status effects.

Name: Return
Description: Successive hits raise power. Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns. Stiff wings strike the foe. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage. Prevents fleeing or switching. Prevents the target from leaving battle. Makes the opposite gender infatuated. Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user. Randomly attacks while asleep. Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping. Eliminates all status problems. Cures the entire party of major status effects. An attack that is based on loyalty. Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

Name: Whirlpool
Description: Boosts water-type moves for 5 turns. Changes the weather to rain for five turns. Boosts fire-type moves for 5 turns. Changes the weather to sunny for five turns. An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage. Counters a SPCL. ATK. move double. Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last special hit it took. Copies the foe's stat changes. Discards the user's stat changes and copies the target's. A powerful first- strike move. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. An attack that may raise all stats. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage. An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage. An attack that hits on 3rd turn. Hits the target two turns later. An attack that may lower DEFENSE. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage. Traps the foe for 2-5 turns. Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.

An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage. Counters a SPCL. ATK. move double. Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last special hit it took. Copies the foe's stat changes. Discards the user's stat changes and copies the target's. A powerful first- strike move. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. An attack that may raise all stats. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage. An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage. An attack that hits on 3rd turn. Hits the target two turns later. An attack that may lower DEFENSE. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage. Traps the foe for 2-5 turns. Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns. Party POKéMON join in the attack.  Hits once for every conscious Pokémon the trainer has. A 1st-turn, 1st-strike move that causes flinching. Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.  Causes the target to flinch. Causes an uproar for 2 to 5 turns and prevents sleep. Forced to use this move for several turns.  Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time. Charges up power for up to 3 turns. Stores energy up to three times for use with Spit Up and Swallow. Releases stockpiled power (the more the better). Power is 100 times the amount of energy Stockpiled. Absorbs stockpiled power and restores HP. Recovers 1/4 HP after one Stockpile, 1/2 HP after two Stockpiles, or full HP after three Stockpiles. Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. Summons a hailstorm that strikes every turn. Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns. Torments the foe and stops successive use of a move. Prevents the target from using the same move twice in a row. Confuses the foe, but raises its SP. ATK. Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target. Inflicts a burn on the foe with intense fire. Burns the target. The user faints and lowers the foe’s abilities. Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by two stages.  User faints. Boosts ATTACK when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. A powerful loyalty attack. The user flinches if hit. If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled. Powerful against paralyzed foes, but also heals them. If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis. Draws attention to make foes attack only the user. Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn. The type of attack varies depending on the location. Uses a move which depends upon the terrain. Charges power to boost the electric move used next. Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  User's Electric moves have doubled power next turn. Taunts the foe into only using attack moves. For the next few turns, the target can only use damaging moves. Boosts the power of the recipient’s moves. Ally's next move inflicts half more damage. Tricks the foe into trading held items. User and target swap items. Mimics the target and copies its special ability. Copies the target's ability. A wish that restores HP. It takes time to work. User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn. Attacks randomly with one of the partner’s moves. Randomly selects and uses one of the trainer's other Pokémon's moves. Lays roots that restore HP. The user can’t switch out. Prevents the user from leaving battle.  User regains 1/16 of its max HP every turn. Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities. Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

A mystical dance that ups ATTACK and SPEED. Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage. Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row. Hits 2-5 times in one turn. A fast and unavoidable electric attack. Never misses. Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target. Summons strong sunlight to attack 2 turns later. Hits the target two turns later. Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK. Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage. The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP. Heals the user by half its max HP. If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry. The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns. For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed. The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats. Raises one of a friendly Pokémon's stats at random by two stages. The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power. Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage. After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting. User must switch out after attacking. The user fights the foe in close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage. If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.  Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn. If the foe has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled. Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn. It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it. Target cannot use held items. The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item. Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item. Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target. Transfers the user's major status effect to the target. The fewer PP this move has, the more power it has for attack.  Power increases when this move has less PP, up to a maximum of 200.

Name: Heal Block
Description: Bounces up, then down the next turn. May paralyze. User bounces high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn. Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage. Has a high critical-hit ratio. May also poison. Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target. Cutely begs to obtain an item held by the foe. Takes the target's item. A life-risking tackle that slightly hurts the user. User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target. Attacks with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded. Never misses. The user becomes soaked to raise resistance to fire. Halves all Fire-type damage. Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind. Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage. Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. A mystical dance that ups ATTACK and SPEED. Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage. Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row. Hits 2-5 times in one turn. A fast and unavoidable electric attack. Never misses. Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target. Summons strong sunlight to attack 2 turns later. Hits the target two turns later. Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK. Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage. The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP. Heals the user by half its max HP. Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitation. Disables moves and immunities that involve flying or levitating for five turns. Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe. Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark. This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however. If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up. The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however. Lowers user's Speed by one stage. The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage. Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150. The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured. User faints.  Its replacement has its HP fully restored and any major status effect removed. If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power. Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining. Name: Copycat
Description: Bounces up, then down the next turn. May paralyze. User bounces high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn. Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage. Has a high critical-hit ratio. May also poison. Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target. Cutely begs to obtain an item held by the foe. Takes the target's item. A life-risking tackle that slightly hurts the user. User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target. Attacks with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded. Never misses. The user becomes soaked to raise resistance to fire. Halves all Fire-type damage. Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind. Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage. Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. A mystical dance that ups ATTACK and SPEED. Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage. Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row. Hits 2-5 times in one turn. A fast and unavoidable electric attack. Never misses. Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target. Summons strong sunlight to attack 2 turns later. Hits the target two turns later. Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK. Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage. The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP. Heals the user by half its max HP. Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitation. Disables moves and immunities that involve flying or levitating for five turns. Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe. Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark. This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however. If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up. The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however. Lowers user's Speed by one stage. The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage. Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150. The user faints. If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power. Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining. For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed. The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats. Raises one of a friendly Pokémon's stats at random by two stages. The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power. Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage. After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting. User must switch out after attacking. The user fights the foe in close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage. The user also sustains serious damage. User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. Name: Echoed Voice
Description: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target. The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target. Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target. The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch. Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch. The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss. Never misses. The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.  Has an increased chance for a critical hit. If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat. Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender. The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle. Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in. The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage. Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power. The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe. Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder. The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding. If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it. The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect. If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry. The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage. The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage. User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats. Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage. The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP. Heals the user by half its max HP. The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage. User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil. The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.  Hits twice in one turn. The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn. User foregoes its next turn to recharge. The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored. User faints, and its replacement is fully healed. The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left. Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power. The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns. Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns. The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.  Puts the target to sleep. The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages. The user creates a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage. The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe used Protect. User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect. The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy. Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage. The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises. Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn. The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target’s. Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target. The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target’s. Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target. The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns. All Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns. The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage. Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense. The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned. Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned. The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat. Raises the user's Speed by two stages and halves the user's weight. The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user. Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn. The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns. Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns. The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns. Negates held items for five turns. The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit. Removes any immunity to Ground damage. The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit. Always scores a critical hit. The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well. Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target. It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit. Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target. The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats. Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each. The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage. Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120. Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it. Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user. The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage. Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150. The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water. Changes the target's type to Water. The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user’s Speed stat. Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage. The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy. Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each. The user attacks the target’s legs swiftly, reducing the target’s Speed stat. Lowers the target's Speed by one stage. The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target’s Sp. Def stat. Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages. The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage. Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat. The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple. Changes the target's ability to Simple. The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s. Copies the user's ability onto the target. The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user. Makes the target act next this turn. The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage. Has double power if it's used more than once per turn. The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage. Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

It may also make the target flinch. Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch. The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss. Never misses. The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.  Has an increased chance for a critical hit. If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat. Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender. The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle. Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in. The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage. Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power. The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe. Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder. The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding. If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it. The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect. If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry. The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage. The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage. User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats. Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage. The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP. Heals the user by half its max HP. The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage. User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil. The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.  Hits twice in one turn. The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn. User foregoes its next turn to recharge. The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored. User faints, and its replacement is fully healed. The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left. Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power. The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns. Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns. The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.  Puts the target to sleep. The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages. The user creates a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage. The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe used Protect. User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect. The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy. Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage. The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises. Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn. The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target’s. Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target. The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target’s. Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target. The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns. All Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns. The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage. Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense. The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned. Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned. The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat. Raises the user's Speed by two stages and halves the user's weight. The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user. Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn. The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns. Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns. The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns. Negates held items for five turns. The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit. Removes any immunity to Ground damage. The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit. Always scores a critical hit. The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well. Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target. It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit. Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target. The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats. Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each. The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage. Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120. Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it. Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user. The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage. Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150. The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water. Changes the target's type to Water. The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user’s Speed stat. Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage. The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy. Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each. The user attacks the target’s legs swiftly, reducing the target’s Speed stat. Lowers the target's Speed by one stage. The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target’s Sp. Def stat. Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages. The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage. Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat. The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple. Changes the target's ability to Simple. The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s. Copies the user's ability onto the target. The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user. Makes the target act next this turn. The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage. Has double power if it's used more than once per turn. The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage. Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200. Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage. Ignores the target's stat modifiers. The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal. Removes all of the target's stat modifiers. The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the damage. Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×. The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises. Prevents any priority moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn. The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies. User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats. Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage. The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. Heals the target for half its max HP. This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems. Has double power if the target has a major status ailment.

It may also make the target flinch. Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch. The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss. Never misses. The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.  Has an increased chance for a critical hit. If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat. Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender. The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle. Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in. The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage. Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power. The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe. Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder. The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding. If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it. The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect. If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry. The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage. The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage. User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats. Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage. The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP. Heals the user by half its max HP. The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage. User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil. The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.  Hits twice in one turn. The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn. User foregoes its next turn to recharge. The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio. Has an increased chance for a critical hit. The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored. User faints, and its replacement is fully healed. The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left. Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power. The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns. Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns. The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.  Puts the target to sleep. The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages. The user creates a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage. The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe used Protect. User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect. The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy. Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage. The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises. Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn. The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target’s. Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target. The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target’s. Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target. The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns. All Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns. The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage. Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense. The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned. Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned. The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat. Raises the user's Speed by two stages and halves the user's weight. The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user. Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn. The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns. Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns. The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns. Negates held items for five turns. The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit. Removes any immunity to Ground damage. The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit. Always scores a critical hit. The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well. Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target. It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit. Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target. The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats. Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each. The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage. Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120. Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it. Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user. The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage. Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150. The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water. Changes the target's type to Water. The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user’s Speed stat. Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage. The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy. Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each. The user attacks the target’s legs swiftly, reducing the target’s Speed stat. Lowers the target's Speed by one stage. The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target’s Sp. Def stat. Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages. The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage. Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat. The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple. Changes the target's ability to Simple. The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s. Copies the user's ability onto the target. The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user. Makes the target act next this turn. The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage. Has double power if it's used more than once per turn. The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage. Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200. Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage. Ignores the target's stat modifiers. The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal. Removes all of the target's stat modifiers. The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the damage. Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×. The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises. Prevents any priority moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn. The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies. User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats. Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage. The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. Heals the target for half its max HP. This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems. Has double power if the target has a major status ailment. The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky. Carries the target high into the air, dodging all attacks against either, and drops it next turn. The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed. Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages. The user throws the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends. Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon. The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up and unusable. Destroys the target's held berry. The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last. Makes the target act last this turn. The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage. Has double power if the user has no held item. The user reflects the target’s type, making it the same type as the target. User becomes the target's type. The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack’s damage increases. Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn. The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user’s HP. Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints. The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item. Gives the user's held item to the target. The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears. With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon's Speed for four turns.

Hits through Protect and Detect. The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type. Adds ghost to the target's types. Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage. The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves. Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn. Makes the user switch out. All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were. Inverts the target's stat modifiers. The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage. Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves. The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power. Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle. The user turns the ground under everyone’s feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn. For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power. The user covers the ground under everyone’s feet with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions. For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves. If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type. Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn. Name: Diamond Storm
Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage. Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense. The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row. Hits 2-5 times in one turn. The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target. Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target. The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. It also damages the user a little. User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil. The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at its target. Hits twice in one turn. An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds. If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it. The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of those listening. It may also induce sleep. Has a $effect_chance% chance to put the target to sleep. The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target. Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense. The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets’ Speed stat. Lowers the target's Speed by one stage. The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis. Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target. The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage. On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. It may leave the target with paralysis. Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target. On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn. Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target’s Sp. Atk stat decrease. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage. The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch. Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch. With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. It lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats. Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each. The user brings down a giant flame. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous thunderbolt. With Fusion Bolt, inflicts double damage. The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous flame. With Fusion Flare, inflicts double damage. The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously. Deals both fighting and flying-type damage. Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves. Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out. The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move. Can only be used after the user has eaten a berry. Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon. Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle. The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle. Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents' Speed by one stage upon switching in. When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises sharply. Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target. The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself. User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect. The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type. Adds ghost to the target's types. Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage. The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves. Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn. The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit. Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets. The user puts a forest curse on the target. Afflicted targets are now Grass type as well. Adds grass to the target's types. The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it. Inflicts regular damage. The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types. Super-effective against water. Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses. Never misses. With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon. Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out. All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were. Inverts the target's stat modifiers. The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user. The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage. Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves. The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power. Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle. The user turns the ground under everyone’s feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn. For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power. The user covers the ground under everyone’s feet with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions. For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves. If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type. Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn. The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage. The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage. The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound. Inflicts regular damage. By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn. Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn. The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact. Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme. The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat. Lowers the target's Attack by one stage. The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat. Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage. The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.

Name: Oblivion Wing
Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage. Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense. The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row. Hits 2-5 times in one turn. The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target. Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target. The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. It also damages the user a little. User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil. The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at its target. Hits twice in one turn. An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds. If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it. The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of those listening. It may also induce sleep. Has a $effect_chance% chance to put the target to sleep. The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target. Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense. The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets’ Speed stat. Lowers the target's Speed by one stage. The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis. Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target. The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage. On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. It may leave the target with paralysis. Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target. On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn. Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target’s Sp. Atk stat decrease. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage. The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch. Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch. With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. It lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats. Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each. The user brings down a giant flame. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous thunderbolt. With Fusion Bolt, inflicts double damage. The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous flame. With Fusion Flare, inflicts double damage. The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously. Deals both fighting and flying-type damage. Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves. Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out. The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move. Can only be used after the user has eaten a berry. Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon. Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle. The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle. Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents' Speed by one stage upon switching in. When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises sharply. Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target. The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself. User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect. The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type. Adds ghost to the target's types. Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage. The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves. Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn. The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit. Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets. The user puts a forest curse on the target. Afflicted targets are now Grass type as well. Adds grass to the target's types. The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it. Inflicts regular damage. The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types. Super-effective against water. Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses. Never misses. With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon. Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out. All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were. Inverts the target's stat modifiers. The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user. The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage. Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves. The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power. Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle. The user turns the ground under everyone’s feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn. For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power. The user covers the ground under everyone’s feet with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions. For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves. If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type. Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn. The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage. The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage. The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound. Inflicts regular damage. By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn. Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn. The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact. Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme. The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat. Lowers the target's Attack by one stage. The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat. Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage. The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit. The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target. Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using Protect or Detect. Ignores and destroys protection effects. The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first. Hits 2–5 times. The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat. Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage. In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact. Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP. The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma. Raises a selected ally's Special Defense by one stage. The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat. Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages. Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target. Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned. The user covers the target in a powder that explodes and damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move. Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move. The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn. Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages. The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability. Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage. Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle. Doubles prize money. The user electrifies the ground under everyone’s feet for five turns. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep. For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day! Does nothing. The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy. Does nothing. The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first. Lowers the target's Attack by one stage. The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis. Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target. The user holds back when it attacks and the target is left with at least 1 HP. Cannot lower the target's HP below 1. The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time. Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns. Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat. Raises the user's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage. The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat. Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by one stage. The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit. Guarantees a critical hit with the user's next move. The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability. Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage. The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns. Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns. The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead. Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP. The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee. Traps the target.

In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn. Requires a turn to charge before attacking. The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves. Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect. The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn. Forces the target's opponents to aim at the target for the rest of the turn. The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat. Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by one stage. The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit. Guarantees a critical hit with the user's next move. The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability. Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage. The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns. Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns. The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead. Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP. The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee. Traps the target. This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns. Protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and increases the power of their  Psychic moves by 50%. The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat. Lowers the target's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage. The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat. Lowers the target's Defense by one stage after inflicting damage. The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power. Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×. To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type. Removes the user's fire type after inflicting damage. The user exchanges Speed stats with the target. Exchanges the user's Speed with the target's.
